description: Hi bread-lovers, I would like to share with you my easy recipe to make a healthy homemade bread with in-season cauliflower - for breakfast, lunch or dinner.
name: Cauliflower Wholemeal Bread Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 sprinkle fresh herbs (such as coriander and parsley)

recipeInstructions.text: Let it cool down. Then squeeze out the excess water in a mash/muslin cloth and put aside.
Separate the egg whites and yolks into different bowls. Whisk the egg whites until they become fluffy like meringue. Set aside.
Beat the egg yolks, and then add the wholemeal flour, baking powder, melted butter, Italian mixed herbs, cauliflower, salt and the whisked egg white bit by bit. Mix well.
Once done, pour the mixture into a lined and buttered baking pan. Sprinkle with sesame seeds and fresh herbs (e.g. coriander and parsley) and on top.
Bake at 180Â°C fan-forced for 45 minute until brown. Test with a toothpick. Remove and let cool down before taking it out of the pan.
Chop the cauliflower into medium size pieces. Grate the pieces in a food processor. Heat the grated cauliflower in a microwave for 4 minute.
